channel.title: Overview on Tech.Feminizidmap.org
channel.description: Recent content in Overview on Tech.Feminizidmap.org

item.title: Mapper
item.description: üóÉÔ∏è Mapper is the main database interface app. It contains the user management, data entry and organisation and exposes a REST API.

item.title: Mapper development
item.description: Development setup Frontend The frontend is a standard Vue.JS application, you need NodeJS installed to run the development environment and build the final app.

item.title: Mapper deployment
item.description: Deployment setup Heroku You can run mapper on Heroku’s ‘hobby’ infrastructure. You need two heroku apps, one for the backend and one for the frontend.

item.title: Mapper backend
item.description: Backend The backend is a Rails application that exposes various API endpoints. Configuration API Rake tasks There are two sets of code lists prepared that you can easily import to get started.

item.title: Briefkasten
item.description: üìÆ Briefkasten is a standalone app used for case reporting. It renders a form from configuration and forwards submitted content to the desired email address.
